nodes.text: The Davezra Way was a hyperspace route. After escaping the Zualjinn Syndicate on Quintil, a group of Spice Runners of Kijimi in the freighter Ragged Claw, piloted by Poe Dameron, evaded Zualjinn starships by hyperspace skipping. One such jump took them to a location along the Davezra Way, where they encountered a massive garsath.
